attributes.action: Save our health visitors, school nurses and nursery nurse's in Cumbria
attributes.background: Due to budget cuts our health visitors, school nurses and nursery nurse's are being cut dramatically. This is going to have a detriment effect on services available in your area and will put children, teenagers, New parents,  and vulnerable families at risk with very little support services

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Specific services in your local area are likely to be the responsibility of your local council and/or local NHS bodies, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

 You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
